metadata.title: CVE-2023-6349 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
A heap overflow vulnerability exists in libvpx - Encoding a frame that haslarger dimensions than the originally configured size with VP9 may resultin a heap overflow in libvpx. We recommend upgrading to version 1.13.1 orabove

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6349` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvpx7 - 1.12.0-1ubuntu2
vpx-tools - 1.12.0-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvpx package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.12.0-1ubuntu2').
